response.overview: It presents the story of a wealthy family celebrating their son inside a luxurious villa, when he suddenly dies while in the middle of celebrating his wedding night,... and it seems that he was poisoned... so the investigation begins and Brigadier Hamidou and Inspector Sufyan do not exclude anyone from their suspicions: the bride, the guests, the squad. Musicians, concert financiers, and others...unless the result emerges, which will be surprising
response.title: ليلة العمر
